!Guard Norton: Welcome to Hunters Village! Normally ruffians gather here, but recently I've been seeing more and more normal people like you around. I will ask you a favor though... please don't stir up any commotions. To the south of the Hunters Village is *Dragon Valley,* and over by Castle Giran, *Giran Castle Town* is situated.
